title: Video: The Acid – Animal
content:
One of the breakthrough artists of the year, Berlin, Australia, Norway locationless trio The Acid retain their anonymity in this video for EP track Animal.

Their unique brand of slightly disorientating, Massive Attack inspired trip-hop flows perfectly with the visuals from their debut video. A sea of greys wash across the screen, as inanimate shapes drift by, making for something utterly captivating and intensely disorientating.

The Acid – Animal from The Acid on Vimeo.
